A picture may be worth a thousand words, but proof that it’s real is priceless.
ProofMode captures information that makes your media more trustworthy.
Getting proof is easy. Once ProofMode is on, use your camera as usual.
ProofMode works in the background to generate and save proof. You don\'t have to do anything special!
Once you’ve taken a photo or video, find it in your camera gallery to share it.
Select a photo, tap the share icon and choose ‘Share Proof’.
Before you send, choose what level of proof to share.
Then choose how to send it.
You can share lots of ways, from email to messaging services like WhatsApp!
ProofMode activates multiple sensors on your phone to generate proof.
Learn about what ProofMode captures in our Data Legend.
ProofMode captures your phone’s identity by default. If you’re not comfortable with this, go to settings to turn it off.
We need to your location in order to document where your media is captured.
Giving permission allows us to document your gps coordinates. We will not track you or store your location in any other way.
If you do not want to capture this data for security or privacy purposes, do not allow permission.
Please enable required permissions in system settings.
